mapper.select: select t.id, t.member_id as memberId, name, title, contents, views, likes, created_date as createdDate from tripInfoShare t join memberinfo m on (t.member_id = m.member_id)
mapper.update: update tripInfoShare set views = #{views} where id = #{id}
UPDATE tripInfoShare SET title = #{title}, contents=#{contents} WHERE id = #{id}
